description_code: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
comments: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.

description_code: A sample collection or study proper name that is centrally registered and unique within one framework.
comments: A sample collection or study proper name that is centrally registered and unique within one framework.

description_code: A proper name that designates a study.
comments: A proper name that designates a study.

description_code: A textual entity describing a study aim or a sample collection.
comments: A textual entity describing a study aim or a sample collection.

description_code: The principle investigtor or responsible person for a study or a sample collection.
comments: The principle investigtor or responsible person for a study or a sample collection.

description_code: An email address for the purpose of contacting a sample collection or study contact person.
comments: An email address for the purpose of contacting a sample collection or study contact person.

description_code: A plan specification comprised of protocols (which may specify how and what kinds of data will be gathered) that are executed as part of an investigation and is realized during a study design execution.
comments: A plan specification comprised of protocols (which may specify how and what kinds of data will be gathered) that are executed as part of an investigation and is realized during a study design execution.

description_code: Data, facts or figures about an individual; the set of relevant items would depend on the use case.
comments: Data, facts or figures about an individual; the set of relevant items would depend on the use case.

description_code: An alphanumeric identifier assigned to a specific patient.
comments: An alphanumeric identifier assigned to a specific patient.

description_code: Biological sex is the quality of a biological organism based on reproductive function or organs.
comments: Biological sex is the quality of a biological organism based on reproductive function or organs.

description_code: A biological sex quality inhering in an individual based upon genotypic composition of sex chromosomes.
comments: A biological sex quality inhering in an individual based upon genotypic composition of sex chromosomes.

description_code: Country of Residence at Enrollment.
comments: Country of Residence at Enrollment.

description_code: The biological quality of membership in a social group based on a common heritage.
comments: The biological quality of membership in a social group based on a common heritage.

description_code: The country that a given person was born in.
comments: The country that a given person was born in.

description_code: The year in which a person was born.
comments: The year in which a person was born.

description_code: An indicator that provides information on the current health status of a patient.
comments: An indicator that provides information on the current health status of a patient.

description_code: The age at which death occurred.
comments: The age at which death occurred.

description_code: An inclusion criterion defines and states a condition which, if met, makes an entity suitable for a given task or participation in a given process.
comments: An inclusion criterion defines and states a condition which, if met, makes an entity suitable for a given task or participation in a given process.

description_code: The most significant institute for medical consultation and/or study inclusion in context of the genetic disease of a person.
comments: The most significant institute for medical consultation and/or study inclusion in context of the genetic disease of a person.

description_code: Material or data not captured by this system though known to be available in other institutes such as biobanks or hospitals.
comments: Material or data not captured by this system though known to be available in other institutes such as biobanks or hospitals.

description_code: The study or studies in which this person participates.
comments: The study or studies in which this person participates.

description_code: A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian.
comments: A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian.

description_code: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.
comments: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

description_code: A name given to the resource.
comments: A name given to the resource.

description_code: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.
comments: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.

description_code: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.
comments: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.

description_code: Date of acceptance of the resource.
comments: Date of acceptance of the resource.

description_code: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.
comments: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.

description_code: Institute is a society or organization having a object or common factor, and is normally applied to those with a scientific, educational, or social objective.
comments: Institute is a society or organization having a object or common factor, and is normally applied to those with a scientific, educational, or social objective.

description_code: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.
comments: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.

description_code: E.g. a dataset is restricted to an instance of an investigation for a specific disease or at geographical location.
comments: E.g. a dataset is restricted to an instance of an investigation for a specific disease or at geographical location.

description_code: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.
comments: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

description_code: A data item consisting of a unique identification code designating an informed consent.
comments: A data item consisting of a unique identification code designating an informed consent.

description_code: The person (subject) whom this individual consent applies.
comments: The person (subject) whom this individual consent applies.

description_code: The informed consent form that was signed.
comments: The informed consent form that was signed.

description_code: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource. Used when a patient requests adaptation or partial withdrawal of the consent.
comments: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource. Used when a patient requests adaptation or partial withdrawal of the consent.

description_code: Indicates the person, group, or institution who performed the collection act.
comments: Indicates the person, group, or institution who performed the collection act.

description_code: A date specification that designates when an informed consent form was signed.
comments: A date specification that designates when an informed consent form was signed.

description_code: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.
comments: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.

description_code: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.
comments: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.

description_code: An individual who is authorized under applicable State or local law to consent on behalf of a child or incapable person to general medical care including participation in clinical research.
comments: An individual who is authorized under applicable State or local law to consent on behalf of a child or incapable person to general medical care including participation in clinical research.

description_code: Barring any restrictions, allow research investigations that requires an informed consent process to take place that make use of material or data from the patient.
comments: Barring any restrictions, allow research investigations that requires an informed consent process to take place that make use of material or data from the patient.

description_code: E.g. a dataset is restricted to an instance of an investigation for a specific disease or at geographical location.
comments: E.g. a dataset is restricted to an instance of an investigation for a specific disease or at geographical location.

description_code: A study in which data from different sources are "linked". Usually used to compile epidemiological data. The logic of record linkage is that two or more items of information about a person recorded at different times, and perhaps in different places, may be of greater value when considered together than when either is considered alone.
comments: A study in which data from different sources are "linked". Usually used to compile epidemiological data. The logic of record linkage is that two or more items of information about a person recorded at different times, and perhaps in different places, may be of greater value when considered together than when either is considered alone.

description_code: The procedure of having an identity established. Implicitly, this answers the question whether a patient would like to be recontacted for e.g. an answer to their diagnostic question.
comments: The procedure of having an identity established. Implicitly, this answers the question whether a patient would like to be recontacted for e.g. an answer to their diagnostic question.

description_code: A planned process for a subject agrees not to be informed about any incidental finding.
comments: A planned process for a subject agrees not to be informed about any incidental finding.

description_code: A document part that prescribes a method of contact in the future.
comments: A document part that prescribes a method of contact in the future.

description_code: Data obtained through patient examination or treatment.
comments: Data obtained through patient examination or treatment.

description_code: A character or string used to name, or characterize a clinical events reference.
comments: A character or string used to name, or characterize a clinical events reference.

description_code: Link to the person whom the clinical information is about.
comments: Link to the person whom the clinical information is about.

description_code: The outward appearance of the individual. In medical context, these are often the symptoms caused by a disease.
comments: The outward appearance of the individual. In medical context, these are often the symptoms caused by a disease.

description_code: Phenotypes or symptoms that were definitely not observed, which may help in differential diagnosis or establish incomplete penetrance.
comments: Phenotypes or symptoms that were definitely not observed, which may help in differential diagnosis or establish incomplete penetrance.

description_code: Types of phenotypic data collected in a clinical setting that is potentially available upon request.
comments: Types of phenotypic data collected in a clinical setting that is potentially available upon request.

description_code: A diagnosis made from a study of the signs and symptoms of a disease.
comments: A diagnosis made from a study of the signs and symptoms of a disease.

description_code: Gene affected by pathogenic variation that is causal for disease of the patient.
comments: Gene affected by pathogenic variation that is causal for disease of the patient.

description_code: Causal variant in HGVS notation with optional classification or free text explaining any other molecular mechanisms involved.
comments: Causal variant in HGVS notation with optional classification or free text explaining any other molecular mechanisms involved.

description_code: The age, measured from some defined time point e.g. birth at which a subject (e.g. a human patient) is diagnosed with some disease e.g. breast cancer.
comments: The age, measured from some defined time point e.g. birth at which a subject (e.g. a human patient) is diagnosed with some disease e.g. breast cancer.

description_code: Age of the patient at the moment of the most recent screening.
comments: Age of the patient at the moment of the most recent screening.

description_code: Unique identifier of a drug conforming to the Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) Classification System, a drug classification system controlled by the WHO Collaborating Centre for Drug Statistics Methodology (WHOCC).
comments: Unique identifier of a drug conforming to the Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) Classification System, a drug classification system controlled by the WHO Collaborating Centre for Drug Statistics Methodology (WHOCC).

description_code: The specific way a therapeutic drug is to be taken, including formulation, route of administration, dose, dosing interval, and treatment duration.
comments: The specific way a therapeutic drug is to be taken, including formulation, route of administration, dose, dosing interval, and treatment duration.

description_code: This term applies to a family member who is diagnosed with the same condition as the individual who is the primary focus of investigation (the proband).
comments: This term applies to a family member who is diagnosed with the same condition as the individual who is the primary focus of investigation (the proband).

description_code: A person related by descent rather than by marriage or law that was also sequenced.
comments: A person related by descent rather than by marriage or law that was also sequenced.

description_code: Information on whether the patient is a child from two family members who are second cousins or closer.
comments: Information on whether the patient is a child from two family members who are second cousins or closer.

description_code: A record of a person's background regarding health, occurrence of disease events and surgical procedures.
comments: A record of a person's background regarding health, occurrence of disease events and surgical procedures.

description_code: Age of onset of clinical manifestations related to a clinical entity.
comments: Age of onset of clinical manifestations related to a clinical entity.

description_code: First contact with specialised center in context of disease or inclusion.
comments: First contact with specialised center in context of disease or inclusion.

description_code: Patient's classification of functioning i.e. disability profile according to International Classification of Functioning and Disability (ICF).
comments: Patient's classification of functioning i.e. disability profile according to International Classification of Functioning and Disability (ICF).

description_code: Natural substances derived from living organisms such as cells, tissues, proteins, and DNA.
comments: Natural substances derived from living organisms such as cells, tissues, proteins, and DNA.

description_code: The unique identification of a material in a specific context.
comments: The unique identification of a material in a specific context.

description_code: Link to the person from whom the material was collected.
comments: Link to the person from whom the material was collected.

description_code: Date and time at which this sample was collected.
comments: Date and time at which this sample was collected.

description_code: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
comments: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

description_code: Describes the procedure whereby biological material for an experiment is sampled.
comments: Describes the procedure whereby biological material for an experiment is sampled.

description_code: A variation from processes or procedures defined in the sampling protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor.
comments: A variation from processes or procedures defined in the sampling protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor.

description_code: The rationale for why a deviation from the sampling protocol has occurred.
comments: The rationale for why a deviation from the sampling protocol has occurred.

description_code: Material distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
comments: Material distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

description_code: Biological entity that constitutes the structural organization of an individual member of a biological species.
comments: Biological entity that constitutes the structural organization of an individual member of a biological species.

description_code: The conditions specified for the storage of a biological material.
comments: The conditions specified for the storage of a biological material.

description_code: The date beyond which a substance is no longer regarded as fit for use.
comments: The date beyond which a substance is no longer regarded as fit for use.

description_code: The determination of the ratio of tumor cells compared to total cells present in a sample. The measurement may be expressed as a ratio or percentage.
comments: The determination of the ratio of tumor cells compared to total cells present in a sample. The measurement may be expressed as a ratio or percentage.

description_code: A reference to a place on the Earth, by its name or by its geographical location. This definition is intentionally vague to allow reuse locally (e.g. which freezer), for contacting (e.g. which institute), broadly for logistical or legal reasons (e.g. city, country or continent).
comments: A reference to a place on the Earth, by its name or by its geographical location. This definition is intentionally vague to allow reuse locally (e.g. which freezer), for contacting (e.g. which institute), broadly for logistical or legal reasons (e.g. city, country or continent).

description_code: A material produced from or related to another. Ideally, this would be a self-reference to Material, but is instread defined as String to prevent issues with circular dependencies in database systems.
comments: A material produced from or related to another. Ideally, this would be a self-reference to Material, but is instread defined as String to prevent issues with circular dependencies in database systems.

description_code: A sample preparation for assay that preparation of nucleic acids for a sequencing assay.
comments: A sample preparation for assay that preparation of nucleic acids for a sequencing assay.

description_code: Any of one or more unique codes that refers to a specific protocol.
comments: Any of one or more unique codes that refers to a specific protocol.

description_code: Link to the material from which this sample was prepared.
comments: Link to the material from which this sample was prepared.

description_code: Amount of input material in ng.
comments: Amount of input material in ng.

description_code: Pre-filled, ready-to-use reagent cartridges. Used to produce improved chemistry, cluster density and read length as well as improve quality (Q) scores. Reagent components are encoded to interact with the sequencing system to validate compatibility with user-defined applications.
comments: Pre-filled, ready-to-use reagent cartridges. Used to produce improved chemistry, cluster density and read length as well as improve quality (Q) scores. Reagent components are encoded to interact with the sequencing system to validate compatibility with user-defined applications.

description_code: A method for amplifying a DNA base sequence using multiple rounds of heat denaturation of the DNA and annealing of oligonucleotide primers complementary to flanking regions in the presence of a heat-stable polymerase. This results in duplication of the targeted DNA region. Newly synthesized DNA strands can subsequently serve as additional templates for the same primer sequences, so that successive rounds of primer annealing, strand elongation, and dissociation produce rapid and highly specific amplification of the desired sequence. PCR also can be used to detect the existence of the defined sequence in a DNA sample.
comments: A method for amplifying a DNA base sequence using multiple rounds of heat denaturation of the DNA and annealing of oligonucleotide primers complementary to flanking regions in the presence of a heat-stable polymerase. This results in duplication of the targeted DNA region. Newly synthesized DNA strands can subsequently serve as additional templates for the same primer sequences, so that successive rounds of primer annealing, strand elongation, and dissociation produce rapid and highly specific amplification of the desired sequence. PCR also can be used to detect the existence of the defined sequence in a DNA sample.

description_code: Any of various techniques designed to select or increase a target item in a mixed sample.
comments: Any of various techniques designed to select or increase a target item in a mixed sample.

description_code: A unique molecular identifier (UMI) barcode is a short nucleotide sequence that is used to identify reads originating from an individual mRNA molecule.
comments: A unique molecular identifier (UMI) barcode is a short nucleotide sequence that is used to identify reads originating from an individual mRNA molecule.

description_code: In paired-end sequencing, the DNA between the adapter sequences is the insert. The length of this sequence is known as the insert size, not to be confused with the inner distance between reads. So, fragment length equals read adapter length (2x) plus insert size, and insert size equals read lenght (2x) plus inner distance.
comments: In paired-end sequencing, the DNA between the adapter sequences is the insert. The length of this sequence is known as the insert size, not to be confused with the inner distance between reads. So, fragment length equals read adapter length (2x) plus insert size, and insert size equals read lenght (2x) plus inner distance.

description_code: The number of nucleotides successfully ordered from each side of a nucleic acid fragment obtained after the completion of a sequencing process.
comments: The number of nucleotides successfully ordered from each side of a nucleic acid fragment obtained after the completion of a sequencing process.

description_code: The determination of complete (typically nucleotide) sequences, including those of genomes (full genome sequencing, de novo sequencing and resequencing), amplicons and transcriptomes.
comments: The determination of complete (typically nucleotide) sequences, including those of genomes (full genome sequencing, de novo sequencing and resequencing), amplicons and transcriptomes.

description_code: A unique identifier assigned to raw data from a performed nucleic acid sequencing assay.
comments: A unique identifier assigned to raw data from a performed nucleic acid sequencing assay.

description_code: Link to the prepared sample that was sequenced.
comments: Link to the prepared sample that was sequenced.

description_code: Date the sequencing run was performed.
comments: Date the sequencing run was performed.

description_code: A sequencing plaform (brand) is a name of a company that produces sequencer equipment.
comments: A sequencing plaform (brand) is a name of a company that produces sequencer equipment.

description_code: A product name and model number of a manufacturer's genomic (dna) sequencer.
comments: A product name and model number of a manufacturer's genomic (dna) sequencer.

description_code: Sequencing distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
comments: Sequencing distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

description_code: The average number of times a particular locus (site, nucleotide, amplicon, region) was sequenced.
comments: The average number of times a particular locus (site, nucleotide, amplicon, region) was sequenced.

description_code: The number of nucleotides successfully ordered from each side of a nucleic acid fragment obtained after the completion of a sequencing process.
comments: The number of nucleotides successfully ordered from each side of a nucleic acid fragment obtained after the completion of a sequencing process.

description_code: In paired-end sequencing, the DNA between the adapter sequences is the insert. The length of this sequence is known as the insert size, not to be confused with the inner distance between reads. So, fragment length equals read adapter length (2x) plus insert size, and insert size equals read lenght (2x) plus inner distance.
comments: In paired-end sequencing, the DNA between the adapter sequences is the insert. The length of this sequence is known as the insert size, not to be confused with the inner distance between reads. So, fragment length equals read adapter length (2x) plus insert size, and insert size equals read lenght (2x) plus inner distance.

description_code: Percentage of reads with a Phred quality score over 30, which indicates less than a 1/1000 chance that the base was called incorrectly.
comments: Percentage of reads with a Phred quality score over 30, which indicates less than a 1/1000 chance that the base was called incorrectly.

description_code: Percentage of the target sequence on which 20 or more unique reads were successfully mapped.
comments: Percentage of the target sequence on which 20 or more unique reads were successfully mapped.

description_code: Other NGS quality control metrics, including but not limited to (i) sequencer metrics such as yield, error rate, density (K/mm2), cluster PF (%) and phas/prephas (%), (ii) alignment metrics such as QM insert size, GC content, QM duplicated reads (%), QM error rate, uniformity/evenness of coverage and maternal cell contamination, and (iii) variant call metrics such as number of SNVs/CNVs/SVs called, number of missense/nonsense variants, common variants (%), unique variants (%), gender match and trio inheritance check.
comments: Other NGS quality control metrics, including but not limited to (i) sequencer metrics such as yield, error rate, density (K/mm2), cluster PF (%) and phas/prephas (%), (ii) alignment metrics such as QM insert size, GC content, QM duplicated reads (%), QM error rate, uniformity/evenness of coverage and maternal cell contamination, and (iii) variant call metrics such as number of SNVs/CNVs/SVs called, number of missense/nonsense variants, common variants (%), unique variants (%), gender match and trio inheritance check.

description_code: Apply analytical methods to existing data of a specific type.
comments: Apply analytical methods to existing data of a specific type.

description_code: An assay identifier is an identifier that identifies some assay (analysis).
comments: An assay identifier is an identifier that identifies some assay (analysis).

description_code: Link to the sequencing performed on which the analysis is based.
comments: Link to the sequencing performed on which the analysis is based.

description_code: A reference to a place on the Earth, by its name or by its geographical location. This definition is intentionally vague to allow reuse locally (e.g. which computer), for contacting (e.g. which institute), broadly for logistical or legal reasons (e.g. city, country or continent).
comments: A reference to a place on the Earth, by its name or by its geographical location. This definition is intentionally vague to allow reuse locally (e.g. which computer), for contacting (e.g. which institute), broadly for logistical or legal reasons (e.g. city, country or continent).

description_code: To maintain data by placing the data, or a copy of the data, onto an electronically accessible device for preservation (either in plain-text or encrypted format).
comments: To maintain data by placing the data, or a copy of the data, onto an electronically accessible device for preservation (either in plain-text or encrypted format).

description_code: A defined way or layout of representing and structuring data in a computer file, blob, string, message, or elsewhere.
comments: A defined way or layout of representing and structuring data in a computer file, blob, string, message, or elsewhere.

description_code: A defined procedure for solving a problem. Applied to a problem-solving procedure implemented in software to be executed by a computer.
comments: A defined procedure for solving a problem. Applied to a problem-solving procedure implemented in software to be executed by a computer.

description_code: A human-readable collection of information about about how a scientific experiment or analysis was carried out that results in a specific set of data or results used for further analysis or to test a specific hypothesis.
comments: A human-readable collection of information about about how a scientific experiment or analysis was carried out that results in a specific set of data or results used for further analysis or to test a specific hypothesis.

description_code: A variation from processes or procedures defined in the bioinformatic protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor.
comments: A variation from processes or procedures defined in the bioinformatic protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor.

description_code: The rationale for why a deviation from the bioinformatic protocol has occurred.
comments: The rationale for why a deviation from the bioinformatic protocol has occurred.

description_code: Any followed systematic statement of policy rules or principles. Guidelines may be developed by government agencies at any level, institutions, professional societies, governing boards, or by convening expert panels.
comments: Any followed systematic statement of policy rules or principles. Guidelines may be developed by government agencies at any level, institutions, professional societies, governing boards, or by convening expert panels.
